name: Bay Sox Girls Fall Workouts
description: The philosophy of the Bay Sox Girls Baseball Program is to encourage the healthy growth and development of the athlete through a program of sports, competitions and teamwork while representing basic values of respect, compassion, and support for each other. It is about fostering the physical, intellectual, emotional, spiritual strengths through positive coaching and sportsmanship for girls and their parents in games, practices, and important life's lessons that sports teach.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
